attributes.action: Ensure pet shops only sell spacious suitable living quarters for animals purchased - in accordance with RSPCA guidelines
attributes.additional_details: Many pet shops recommend people buying animals an unsuitable living space. This directly affects the welfare and life of the animal. We believe that pet shops should only sell people the RSPCA recommended housing size for the pet(s) they have purchased. Especially in terms of rodent's cages, runs and hutches - provide as large a space as possible for pets toys, play, exercise and life!
